price: Emwe bemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bakubahiriza n’amabwirizwa yayo! Nimushishikare mwumvira Imana Allah, mwumvira n’Intumwa yayo, kandi ntimugatume ibikorwa vyanyu bicika impfagusa ku guca kubiri n’amabwirizwa yayo.
arabic: ۞ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ وَلَا تُبۡطِلُوٓاْ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū aṭīʿū al-laha wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla walā tub'ṭilū aʿmālakum
